text:
Suggested Reading
Radioscript in The Jeffersonian Heritage, Ch. X
Catherine Drinker Bowen, John Adams and the American Revolution (Little,
Brown, 1950) Chs. 20-22, for the Boston Massacre and the trial
(Ch. 22) (This widely read book is romanticized history hut it is
essentially correct.)
Much of the correspondence between Jefferson and Abigail Adams is in print,
but it is in old and relatively inaccessible books.
